titles: By the Queene. Where by occasion of certayne arrestes made in the lowe countreys of the kyng of Spayne, in the yere of our Lorde 1568. by order of the Duke of Alua lieftenaunt and captayne generall in the sayde lowe countreys, the Queenes Maiesties subiectes with all theyr goodes ...
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I)
publisher: In Powles Churchyarde by Richarde Iugge and Iohn Cawood, Printers to the Queenes Maiestie,
notes: A proclamation for recompense of goods taken by the King of Spain.
At foot of sheet: Cum priuilegio Regi√¶ Maiestatis.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
